dcterms:creator: Hannah Rose Kirk
Wenjie Yin
Bertie Vidgen
Paul Röttger
dcterms:description: A dataset for detecting and classifying sexist content in online spaces, specifically designed for the SemEval-2023 Task 10. It includes labeled and unlabeled data from platforms like Gab and Reddit.
dcterms:title: SemEval2023 Task 10 Dataset

dcterms:creator: Hannah Rose Kirk
Wenjie Yin
Bertie Vidgen
Paul Röttger
dcterms:description: An unlabeled dataset containing user-generated text content from Gab and Reddit, used for model adaptive pretraining in the context of detecting online sexism.
dcterms:title: Unlabeled Dataset from Gab and Reddit

dcterms:creator: Francisco Rodríguez-Sánchez
Jorge Carrillo-de Albornoz
Laura Plaza
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 10,000 tweets collected on various topics, used for training models to detect sexism in social media.
dcterms:title: Twitter Dataset of 10,000 Tweets

dcterms:creator: Mina Schütz
Jaqueline Boeck
Daria Liakhovets
Djordje Slijepčević
Armin Kirchknopf
Manuel Hecht
Johannes Bogensperger
Sven Schlarb
Alexander Schindler
Matthias Zeppelzauer
dcterms:description: A multilingual dataset designed for sexism detection, utilizing transformer models for automatic classification across different languages.
dcterms:title: Multilingual Dataset for Sexism Detection
